text: Đinh Tiến Thành born on 24 January 1991, is a Vietnamese professional footballer for Hà Nội FC as a defender and a member of the Vietnam national team.Bongda: Tân binh ĐTQG Đinh Tiến Thành: Từ sân phủi tới châu lục Bongda: Đinh Tiến Thành được giảm án Bongda: Đinh Tiến Thành ngất ngây với tuyệt phẩm đầu đời He started his career in Vissai Ninh Bình F.C. moving in 2012 to Hải Phòng F.C. In 2014, he was selected for Vietnam. He represented Vietnam U23 in the 2013 Southeast Asian Games. ==Honours== ===International=== Vietnam *AFF Championship :Semi-finalists : 2014, 2016 * AYA Bank Cup : Winners :: 2016 ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Vietnam's goal tally first. {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |- !Goal!!Date!!Venue!!Opponent!!Score!!Result!!Competition |- | 1. || 8 September 2015 || Taipei Municipal Stadium, Taipei, Taiwan || || align=center | 1–0 || align=center | 2–1 || 2018 FIFA World Cup qualification |} == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ninh Bình Province Category:Vietnamese footballers Category:Hai Phong F.C. players Category:XSKT Cần Thơ F.C. players Category:FLC Thanh Hóa F.C. players Category:V.League 1 players Category:Vietnam international footballers Category:Association football central defenders
title: Đinh Tiến Thành
